about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Supermarket!! After choosing the difficulty level from which we want our empire to start, we will choose the logo that we want to represent us and the person (man or woman) that we want to take the reins.

When we move on to the main stage, three maps, weather effects, day and night cycles, and more than a hundred objects await us to discover and implement in our market... and at the end of each day, a treasure chest will allow us to obtain an advantage or a disadvantage to get us through to the next day.

Welcome everyone to Supermarket, the Supermarket Management video game!!
detailed_description:
Welcome to the world of Supermarket!! After choosing the difficulty level from which we want our empire to start, we will choose the logo that we want to represent us and the person (man or woman) that we want to take the reins.

When we move on to the main stage, three maps, weather effects, day and night cycles, and more than a hundred objects await us to discover and implement in our market... and at the end of each day, a treasure chest will allow us to obtain an advantage or a disadvantage to get us through to the next day.

Welcome everyone to Supermarket, the Supermarket Management video game!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 21H1
  • Processor: AMD E1-2100 APU
  • Graphics: RADEON HD Graphics 1.00 GHz
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: No
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: Create your own market empire. Build stores, invest in new products, hire employees, expand your empire around the world... Enjoy your time being the best manager in the market!
